App start: uvicorn app2:app --reload --port 8080 --host 0.0.0.0

----

Command: curl http://127.0.0.1:8080/calculate/ -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"operation": "add", "num1":10, "num2": 10}'
Output: {"type":"SUCCESS","output":20}
Logs: INFO:     127.0.0.1:47488 - "POST /calculate/ HTTP/1.1" 200 OK
----

Logs:
